message: The "Civi\Test\CiviTestListenerPHPUnit7" class implements "PHPUnit\Framework\TestListener" that is deprecated.
The "Civi\Test\CiviTestListenerPHPUnit7" class uses "PHPUnit\Framework\TestListenerDefaultImplementation" that is deprecated The `TestListener` interface is deprecated.
The "Civi\Core\Event\GenericHookEvent" class extends "Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\Event" that is deprecated since Symfony 4.3, use "Symfony\Contracts\EventDispatcher\Event" instead.

Calling the "Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\EventDispatcherInterface::dispatch()" method with the event name as the first argument is deprecated since Symfony 4.3, pass it as the second argument and provide the event object as the first argument instead.
The "CRM_Batch_BAO_Batch::links()" method will require a new "array $new_links" argument in the next major version of its parent class "DB_DataObject", not defining it is deprecated.
The "CRM_Activity_BAO_ActivityContact::links()" method will require a new "array $new_links" argument in the next major version of its parent class "DB_DataObject", not defining it is deprecated.
